objectives.name: We demonstrate how innovative approaches to community development can deliver new technical contributors to Mozilla technologies

results.name: 20 new diverse US Clubs
results.description: 20 new diverse US clubs are making valuable technical contributions to Mozilla (or Mozilla supported) open source projects through Student Clubs [shared with Open Source Experiments].

results.name: Dev Communities Experiments
results.description: Pilot 2-3 in-market experiments for recruiting and building diverse and inclusive developer communities [Shared with Dev Marketing + Dev Rel]

results.name: Activate - Technical contributors
results.description: Activate is actively engaging 70 new technical contributors

objectives.name: We have shown progress on the creation of a unified approach across Mozilla for recruiting, aligning and investing in mobilizers that is showing direct value for business objectives

results.name: Core community sentiment bigger than 11 and a half NPS
results.description: Core community sentiment bigger than 11 and a half NPS

results.name: 70 percent Reps Activate activities
results.description: 70 percent of Reps activities are in support of activities prioritized on Activate mobilizer portal

scoring.0.33: more than 50 percent activities to Activate
scoring.0.66: more than 60 percent activities to Activate
scoring.1.00: more than 70 percent activities to Activate

results.name: Activate Feedback mechanism
results.description: 100 percent of Activate activities are using the new feedback/tracking mechanism

scoring.0.33: more than 50 percent use new feedback mechanism
scoring.0.66: more than 80 percent use new feedback mechanism
scoring.1.00: more than 100 percent use new feedback mechanism

objectives.name: We have a comprehensive understanding of our existing communities and a draft proposal for organizing models moving forward

results.name: Analysis Existing Communities
results.description: Data and qualitative narrative of existing communities and contributors, their skills, motivations, locations and current state of impact

results.name: Mobilizer experiment
results.description: Mobilizer experiment has produced a clear set of recommendations that will inform our mobilizer strategy and programs

objectives.name: We have a preliminary Diversity and Inclusion for Participation strategy that is an opinionated and reliable input to the OI Strategy and teams across Mozilla

results.name: 3 Experiments
results.description: 3 experiments have tested and validated research-based hypotheses

results.name: Draft for Strategy
results.description: Deliver a preliminary draft of the D&I for Participation Strategy

results.name: CPG implementation
results.description: We pilot CPG implementation in 2 communities and publish the results
